item.description:
The Brattle Theatre's recurring Doctor Who showings are back again! They're doing two Fourth Doctor Serials and a showing of one of the latest Eleventh Doctor two-parters.  The show starts at 9:30.

Here's the synopsis for this episode: "In a remote desert on a distant planet, a vast mobile sandminer is on an extended expedition in search of rare and valuable ores. The vessel is commanded by a crew of indolent or avaricious human staff - many of whom have secrets to hide - but they are easily outnumbered by the elegant and efficient robots employed in various duties. It is a happy partnership until the human crew start being murdered one by one..."

 

http://brattlefilm.org/2012/01/20/hooked-on-who/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to have a red Meetup sign with me, but look for the large group of us congregating outside the theater!
item.name: Hooked On Who: The Robots of Death
